entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Nanaimo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:17 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nanaimo Airport 7:13 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: 4.3°C
Wind: SE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this evening then clearing. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 70 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia early in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. Windy. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023
